mapper.insert: insert into USER_INQRY (USER_IDX, ID, TITLE, CTENT, WRITER) values (#{user_idx},#{id},#{title},#{ctent},#{writer});
mapper.select: SELECT USER_INQRY.*,INQRY_TYPE.NAME AS parents_name FROM INQRY_TYPE, (SELECT USER_INQRY.*, INQRY_TYPE.UPP_FLOOR,INQRY_TYPE.NAME FROM INQRY_TYPE, (SELECT * FROM USER_INQRY WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx}) AS USER_INQRY WHERE USER_INQRY.ID = INQRY_TYPE.ID) AS USER_INQRY WHERE USER_INQRY.UPP_FLOOR = INQRY_TYPE.ID;
